parties: understandings have been included in this Agreement

termination_clause.text:
termination of this Agreement or dissolution of the Venture. Language 47. The Members expressly state that the English language is to be the language of choice for this Agreement and all other notices and agreements required by the Venture. Page 9 of 13





Insurance 48. The Venture will insure all its assets against loss where reasonable and standard practice in the industry. Indemnification 49. Each Member will be indemnified and held harmless by the Venture from any and all harm or damages of any nature relating to the Member's participation in Venture affairs except where such harm or damages results from gross negligence or willful misconduct on the part of the Member. Liability 50. No Member will be liable to the Venture or to any other Member for any error in judgment or any act or failure to
